ActivityMetadata.Name: PD Snooze an incident
ActivityMetadata.Label: PD Snooze an incident
ActivityMetadata.Description:
Snooze an incident.
An incident represents a problem or an issue that needs to be addressed and resolved.
For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#incidents)
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# PagerDuty

Snooze an incident

Snooze an incident. An incident represents a problem or an issue that needs to be addressed and resolved. For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#incidents)

Method: Post

OperationID: createIncidentSnooze

EndPoint:

/incidents/{id}/snooze
